categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A raid on Tangrene took place during the Galactic Civil War and was Garm Bel Iblis's movement's most prestigious military victory.

Tangrene was the location of an Imperial Ubiqtorate center attacked by Garm Bel Iblis with all his five Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers, three years after his split from the Rebel Alliance. Bel Iblis' forces managed to lure three Star Destroyers guarding the place and destroyed the Ubiqtorate base. The Rebel casualties were relatively light with moderate damage and one cruiser out of commission for nearly seven months.
